scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy:dev:
firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions && echo '
	you are on DEV now
'
scripts.deploy:stg:
firebase use stg && firebase deploy --only functions && echo '
	you are on STG now
'
scripts.deploy:prd:
firebase use prd && firebase deploy --only functions && echo '
	you are on PRD now
'
